content.text:
# List of municipal presidents of Tonalá, Jalisco

Following is a list of municipal presidents of Tonalá, in the Mexican state of Jalisco:
{| class=wikitable
|-
!width=180px|Term
!width=190px|Municipal president
!width=60px|Political party
!width=290px|Notes
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1954 – 1955-12-31||J. Jesús Álvarez Pérez || PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1956-01-01 – 1958-12-31||Nicolás Gabriel Parra ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1959-01-01 – 1961-12-31||Brígido Sandoval Ramos ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1962-01-01 – 1964-12-31||Isidoro Ramos Bautista ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"

|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1968-01-01 – 1970-12-31||Francisco Hernández Langarica ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1971-01-01 – 1973-12-31||Francisco Oliva Lemus ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"

|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1986-01-01 – 1988-12-31||Melquiades Preciado Partida ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1989–1992 ||Vidal Maestro Murguía ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1992–1995 ||J. Timoteo Campechano Silva ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#DDEEF6"
|1995–1997 ||Felipe Jarero Escobedo ||PAN ||
|- style="background:#DDEEF6"
|1997 ||Guillermo López Mateos ||National Action Party|PAN ||Acting municipal president
|- style="background:#DDEEF6"
|1997 ||Angelita García Beato ||National Action Party|PAN ||Acting municipal president
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|1998-01-01 – 2000 ||Jorge Arana Arana ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|2000 – 2000-12-31||Juan Lara Lucano ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||Acting municipal president
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|2001-01-01 – 2003-12-31 ||Vicente Vargas López ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
|2004-01-01 – 2006-12-31||Palemón García Real ||Institutional Revolutionary Party|PRI ||
|- style="background:#ddeef6"
|2007-01-01 – 2007-12-20||Jorge Luis Vizcarra Mayorga ||PAN ||His political immunity was removed
|- style="background:#ddeef6"
|2007-12-21 – 2008-02-26||Salvador González del Toro ||PAN ||Substitute
|- style="background:#ddeef6"
|2008-02-27 – 2009-09-03 ||Emanuel Agustín Ordóñez Hernández ||PAN ||Acting municipal president
|- style="background:#ddeef6"

|- style="background:#ffe1e1"
